title: Ladbrokes logo font
content:
Hi, guys:)

This one will be probably easy for you, it is bugging me all day.

[link to picture](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111122240/http:/tweetphoto.com/13696714)

from what i know, i presume this is some sort of humanist sans serif (or even serif?) in true italics, but this little serifs on the ascenders are giving me hard time.

your time and effort is appreciated a lot;)

thnx, bye.
author: andrej trilavov

comments.content: It looks to be a modified [Frutiger Next bold italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111122240/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/frutiger_next_pro_w1g_bold_italic/)
Yes, Frutiger Next bold italic was definitely reference for that font. Thanks for helping.
